description: This file defines the AnalysisService class which provides methods for analyzing resumes and matching resumes to job descriptions, including heuristic scoring based on skills and keywords overlaps.

classes.name: AnalysisService
classes.description: Service class providing resume analysis and matching functionalities, involving heuristic scoring based on skills and keywords overlap.

methods.name: analyzeResume
methods.description: Analyzes a resume identified by resumeId to produce a score based on keywords and skills, with additional suggestions.

methods.name: matchResumeToJob
methods.description: Computes overlap scores between a resume and a job description based on skills and keywords, providing detailed overlap and mismatches.
